item.title: 2 Years of Cybersecurity Study Has Instilled an Adversarial Mindset in Me
item.description: Having almost finished my study in cybersecurity in the SECCLO master’s program, I often find myself thinking how to compromise / attack a system, be it a digital or just a physical system. item.title: Things to consider when writing motivation letter for scholarships
item.description: There is no right or wrong in writing a motivation letter. In this post, I merely show you how I wrote mine which got me a scholarship. First things first: Who am I & why should you trust me? I was granted an Erasmus Mundus scholarship to pursue a Master’s degree in SECCLO, co-funded by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union.
